mapper.select: select id, icd_code, code, name, type from disease where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into disease (icd_code, code, name, type) values (#{icd_code}, #{code}, #{name}, #{type})
mapper.update: update disease set icd_code = #{icd_code}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
